## Description {#details}

Represents a read-write view of a CodeView string table.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/debugstringtablesubsection">DebugStringTableSubsection</a> owns the underlying storage for the table, and is capable of serializing the string table into a format understood by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/debugstringtablesubsectionref">DebugStringTableSubsectionRef</a>.

Definition at line 56 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/codeview/debugstringtablesubsection-h">DebugStringTableSubsection.h</a>.
